div.p:
Win or lose, our avatar will gain some experience points and eventually
we'll be able to level them up. Having won our previous

battle, we've already gained a level, so now we've got our first
skill point to spend.

This screen hosts the Avatar skill tree, offering a variety of
upgrades each with unique bonuses. We can roll over a skill to
find out more and left-click to apply it.

The retainer panel displays all the characters and objects available
to us. Retainers can boost our army's abilities in battle and

also inflict penalties on our enemy. To take a retainer into our
next battle, we simply drag it into one of our empty slots. Right now
we have two slots available, we'll earn more as our Avatar gains levels.
